desc:
40% boost to all parameters, enormously boosts elemental damage, considerably boosts ATK relative to HP & raises Atk parameter limits to 170000
Guild Raid: Adds enormous all elemental damage boost for 3 turns effect to SBB & negates Atk, Def, Rec reduction effects

dictionary.lore: With success comes rich rewards, and few are as wondrous - or powerful - as this creation. With several outstanding benefits (especially in Guild battles), the advantages it brings can turn a glimmer of hope into certain victory.

name: Snowbound Victory
